name: Chaos Web
description:
Chromium Based Browser Recommended (Chrome, Edge, Brave, etc.) Please use Firefox for other things though :)

...Chaos...  

Create order in chaos! 

Have fun in this new ambient and ultra-relaxing game! 

How to play:

Balls are everywhere! Tap anywhere on the screen to drop a ball! Use it to capture all the other balls. 

Careful! You only get one tap. Use it wisely.

Finish each level with as few tries as possible and get the best score.
